questions.question_text: Which of the following is a required field in the Resolution Information tad in order to close a case?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Note: The Resolution Code and Resolution notes must be entered in the Resolution Information tab.

https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/reference/r_CustomerServiceCaseStates.html

https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-it-service-management/page/product/incident-management/task/resolve-and-close-an-incident.html

Selected Answer: C
C is correct

questions.question_text: Access to a Knowledge base or Article can be restricted based on a customerâ€™s assets and the product models using which of the following?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
while user criteria can be used for knowledge base and article restrictions, knowledge product entitlements would be what you use to restrict it based on a customer's assets and products.

A should be correct

Selected Answer: A
A is correct
Agreed, I thought A as well

questions.question_text: What benefits does scoping an application bring? (Choose three.)

choices.B: Provides CSM teams autonomy and control
choices.E: Changes in different scopes can be addressed in a single update set
choices.D: Account records can be changed only while in the CSM scope
choices.A: CSM teams can move at their desired pace, independent of IT
choices.C: CSM application data and business logic is protected from changes by other applications

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ABC
ABC is correct

Selected Answer: ABC
ABC should be correct.

Selected Answer: BCE
BCE is Correct

comments.content: update set has to have specific scope, it cannot be cross scope, so ABC should be a logical choice

questions.question_text: A customer service agent wants to escalate an account but is unable to use the Escalate Account related link on the Account form. What could be the reasons why the customer service agent is not able to use it? (Choose two.)

choices.C: The customer service agent is not assigned with the escalation requester role
choices.D: The account already has an open escalation record
choices.B: The parent account of the account to be escalated is not active
choices.A: No escalation approval flow is configured

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: CD
C and D are correct.

Selected Answer: CD
Tried on a PDI, once an escalated request is submitted the related link becomes unavailable.

Selected Answer: A
About this task

Performance Analytics regularly collects scores from your data on an ongoing basis. When you first set up Performance Analytics for an application, or when you create new indicators or indicator sources, run historical data collection to collect scores on your existing data. Historical data collection enables you to analyze data that existed prior to setting up Performance Analytics.

https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-now-intelligence/page/use/performance-analytics/task/t_RunHistoricalDataCollection.html

Selected Answer: A
A is correct i believe.

https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/vancouver-now-intelligence/page/use/performance-analytics/task/t_RunHistoricalDataCollection.html
